title: FurMark 1.15 Portable
description:
FurMark is a very intensive OpenGL benchmark that uses fur rendering algorithms to measure the performance of the graphics card. Fur rendering is especially adapted to overheat the GPU and that's why FurMark is also a perfect stability and stress test tool (also called GPU burner) for the graphics card.

I found this tool very useful for myself but ozone3d doesn't offer a portable version of this software, so I made it portable, just unzip and the software is there, no installer included or needed.

The official download page is http://www.ozone3d.net/benchmarks/fur/. The latest releases can be found there.

FurMark is free for personal use. Commercial licenses can be found at http://www.ozone3d.net/g3dpp/
